review_data.title: 朝食もディナーも満足
review_data.content: 朝食のビュッフェは品数は少ないが、健康的な品揃え。チーズの種類が多いのがうれしい。ディナーはお酒のつまみがおいしい。アン...More

review_data.title: Very nice restaurant for your breakfast in Hotel City in Zürich
review_data.content: Hotel City Restaurant offer you classic breakfast offer with cheeses, hams, eggs, vegetables, bread, croassaints, müsli, etc. Location is very nice, same as smiley staff :-)

review_data.title: Good breakfast buffet
review_data.content: Nice little hotel restaurant. The breakfast buffet has many different and good tasting choices including freshly squeezed orange juice. You can also get scrambled or hard boiled eggs. Overall good place to eat.

review_data.title: Неплохой ресторанчик
review_data.content: Жили в отеле, на первом этаже которого и находится это ресторан. Завтраки плотные, сытные, народу немного, персонал приветливый, есть отличные...More

review_data.title: Great lunch place
review_data.content: They offer a good set menu each lunch for a great price. The quality is great and the food always very tasty. The service is also very good. Also great for coffees.

review_data.title: Ótima localização
review_data.content: Hotel muito bem localizado, perto da hauptbahnhof ! Muito limpo e quarto novo! Restaurante excelente, café da manhã completo!

review_data.title: Agréable pour une nuitée mais sans plus

review_data.title: Very nice breakfast
review_data.content: Stayed at adjoining hotel. Great breakfast Typical European flair. Especially like the assortment of hams cheeses and yogurt!

review_data.title: Völlig überteuert

review_data.title: Bar not restaurant
review_data.content: Hotel clean, tidy for 3 star. Water not hot until after 8am! Very limited food in restaurant, mainly burgers. Waitress said really a bar. Prices very high, got over charged for drinks, even charged for mayonnaise with fries!!!, Would definitely not recommend or stay there...More
